description:
Former No.1 picks are on the move in a BLOCKBUSTER NFL trade. Lions QB Matt Stafford heads to the Rams in exchangeÂ for Jared Goff, two first-round picks and a third-round pick. While this move improves the Rams by half a win (that's significant in the NFL) according to SportsLine data scientistÂ Stephen Oh, the Pick Six squad has a few takes of their own to share on an emergency pod few of us saw coming.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
